mapper.select: select * from webtoon where title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' or writingAuthorName LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into webtoon(title, thumbnail, synopsis, starScoreAverage, readCount, linkUrl, writingAuthorName) values(#{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{synopsis}, #{starScoreAverage}, #{readCount}, #{linkUrl}, #{writingAuthorName})
